Name: market for toluene diisocyanate | toluene diisocyanate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2013:Manufacture of plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18607/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'toluene diisocyanate', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;toluene diisocyanate', is a plastic product of fossil origin. It is a precursor substance meant to be used for the further production of plastics. It is solid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure, colourless with sharp and pungen odour. The product is used in the following applications and sectors: for consumer uses: fabric, textile, and leather products, foam seating and bedding products, furniture and furnishings, laundry and dishwashing products, personal care products, for industrial uses: adhesives and sealant chemicals, intermediates, propellants and blowing agents, reactant, solvent.  

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'toluene diisocyanate',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  toluene diisocyanate', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
